short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stoic Quotes At The Click Of A Button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension where you can get a new Stoic Quote at the click of a button.

Get access to hundreds of quotes by Seneca, Zeno, Marcus Aurelius and Seneca.

No complications. A simple stoic extension
